meta.name: 泰道 Bangkok Express
meta.about:
在西營盤出發去曼谷泰國媽媽的廚房！ Bangkok Express carry you to Thai Mama’s kitchen. Great and traditional taste with good vibes! 

Hotline: 52852277 (WhatsApp or direct call)
meta.addr: G/F, 2D Western Street, Sai Ying Pun (3 minutes walk from Sai Ying Pun Station Exit B3)西營盤 西邊街2號D地下鋪（港鐵西營盤站B3出口 步行3分鐘）
